messages.subject: looking for sca sparing partner in southern va.
messages.msgSnippet: I am Hidetomo Yoshimitsu. I reacently moved to southern virginia from North Carolina.  The local sca group is all a&s and has no fighters. I am trying to find
messages.messageBody:
I am Hidetomo Yoshimitsu. I reacently moved to southern virginia from
North Carolina. The local sca group is all a&s and has no fighters.
I am trying to find anyone in the area to practice with. I Have been
playing a Japenese persona for around 5 years now. I love it and
enjoy the art of heavy combat. Hope to meet some of you on the list
field.

Hidetomo Yoshimitsu
faithful servant of the dream
and loyal to the crown of Atlantia
